description: Investigate MyBinder.org platform limitations, requirements, and best practices for hosting scientific notebooks. mybinder_notes: Key constraints: 2GB RAM limit, 10GB storage, 10-minute idle timeout, 6-hour maximum runtime. No persistent storage. Limited to conda/pip installable packages.
